ROW.DATDSC: select '' SEL,'' flag,a.yy,a.mm,a.dd,a.pch,a.pzlx,a.str_pzh,zy, decode('[%SZBZ]','3',jfje,'1',jfje,null) jfje, decode('[%SZBZ]','2',dfje,null) dfje, JEFX,ye,jsfs,djh,lsh,dylsh,sxh,dwbh,dwmc,czlx,fkbz,fkrxm,fkrq,fkyk, dybz,dyrq,dyr,czyxm,lxbh,qcbz,pzh,aae008 from ( select substr(rq,0,4) yy,substr(rq,5,2) mm,substr(rq,7,2) dd,'' pch,'' PZLX,'' STR_PZH, max(zy) /*decode('[%SZBZ]','1','收','支')||max(dwjc)||substr(rq,0,6)||'保险金'*/ zy, sum(je1+je2+je3+je4+je5+je6+je7+je8+je9+je10+je11+je12+je13+je14+je15) jfje, sum(je1+je2+je3+je4+je5+je6+je7+je8+je9+je10+je11+je12+je13+je14+je15) dfje, '平' JEFX,'Q' ye,jsfs,djh,lsh,'' dylsh,'' sxh,dwbh,max(dwmc) dwmc,'' czlx,'' fkbz,'' FKRXM,'' fkrq,'' FKYK, '' dybz,'' dyrq,'' dyr,'' czyxm,'' lxbh,'' qcbz,'' pzh,aae008 FROM v_si_djb_tmp where rq >= '[%DAT1]' and rq <='[%DAT2]' and org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and rzbz='0'/*入账标志*/ and zbbz = '0'/*写入标志0-业务系统写入 1-财务系统写入*/ and nvl(zfbz,'0') = '0' /*20130109 qfj add作废标志（0-未作废；1-作废）*/ --and nvl(zjpch,'-1') = decode('',null,nvl(zjpch,'-1'),'') /*收：批次号；支:个人编号*/ and djh = decode('',null,djh,'')/*单据号*/ and ywlx=decode('[%YWLX]',null,ywlx,'[%YWLX]') and (PCH LIKE '[%PCH]%' OR ZJPCH LIKE '[%PCH]%') and djh like '[%DJH]%' and nvl(aae008,'-1')=decode('[%YHZL]',null,nvl(aae008,'-1'),'[%YHZL]')/*业务发放点银行种类代码*/ and nvl(jsfs,'-1') like decode('[%HDFS]',null,nvl(jsfs,'-1'),'[%HDFS]')||'%' /*核定方式*/ group by rq,djh,dwbh,jsfs,lsh,aae008 order by djh asc ) a

ROW.NAME: 单位类型
查询日记帐打印数据
ROW.DATDSC: SELECT a.yy,a.mm,a.dd,a.pch,a.zy,a.kmbh,a.dwbh,a.dwmc,a.je,a.jefx,a.jsfs,a.fkrq, b.mxxh,b.lxbh,b.lxxh,b.ym1,b.ym2,b.je mxje,b.jefx mxjefx, c.rjlx,c.kxmc FROM CW_RJZB a, CW_RJZMXB b,( SELECT "CW_RJLXB"."RJLX","CW_RJLXMXB"."KXMC","CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH","CW_RJLXMXB"."MXXH" FROM "CW_RJLXMXB" , "CW_RJLXB" WHERE ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ORG" = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) AND ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ACC" = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."SBH" = "CW_RJLXB"."SBH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."ZTH" = "CW_RJLXB"."ZTH" ) and ( "CW_RJLXMXB"."LXBH" = "CW_RJLXB"."LXBH" ) ) c WHERE ( a.ORG = '[%SYS_ORGID]' AND a.ACC = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( a.SBH = b.SBH and a.ZTH = b.ZTH and a.lsh=b.lsh) and ( a.ORG = b.ORG and a.ACC = b.ACC ) and a.lsh='[%LSH]' and b.LXBH = c.LXBH and b.lxxh=c.mxxh order by b.mxxh

ROW.NAME: 代发点银行种类
ROW.DATDSC: select aaa102 id,aaa103 name from aa10 where aaa100='BAE010' order by aaa102

ROW.NAME: 核定方式
ROW.DATDSC: select aaa102 id,aaa103 name from aa10 where aaa100='BAC468' order by aaa102

ROW.NAME: 日记帐顺序号
ROW.DATDSC: select nvl(max(sxh),0)+1 sxh from cw_rjzb where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and yy='[%YY]' and mm='[%MM]' and kmbh='[%KMBH]'
